item.title: GOP congressman takes major step toward gubernatorial announcement
item.description: A House Republican from Iowa is unveiling a campaign finance committee ahead of his expected announcement that he is running for governor.

item.title: GOP congressman 'remains concerned' over ICE operations in deep blue state

item.title: Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' cracks down on Biden's student loan 'scheme,' top Republican says
item.description: Senate HELP Committee Chairman Bill Cassidy spoke with Fox News Digital about his portion of President Donald Trump's "big, beautiful bill."
